title: The Evening Star (1996) MacLaine (DVDrip opt.NL subs)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116240/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116240/</a>

Optional Dutch subs in separate idx/sub files.

This classic with Shirley MacLaine continues the story from 'Terms of Endearment'. No torrent for this film remains on the net, so I bought a copy of the only available European edition. It has only Dutch subtitles, so I kept them as an obtion for our friends in the Netherlands.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB.

DVDrip XviD 2-pass AC3.
Letterbox format 672x512, great stereo AC3.

Burn tested, runs well in my standalone DivX player.

Source: PAL retail (note that PAL/NTSC will give no problems for avi files)
